name: Hoopoe's Song - The Paradox
description:
HAPPY 15TH ANNIVERSARY FPS CREATOR!

Yes, someone is still making games on FPSC in 2021...

A completely random project. 

Supposed to be a spiritual successor to my "Weapon of Doomsday" game.

It's gift to all FPSC-lovers, dedicated to 15th Anniversary of TGC's FPS Creator!

This game is some sort of surprise!

Special thanks:

The Game Creators Team

Authors of some random pictures, soundtracks and videos found on Internet
